name: Dance of Arrows
description:
WASD or Arrow Keys to Move.

Spacebar, Enter, or Button to Reset.

All the Music and Sound Design done by the extremely talented: @Choucroute

Dance of arrows was created for the Three Hour 102 #Trijam, with the Theme Contrast.

This was an attempt to explore different ways of contrasting through Size,  Value,  Rhythm and Gameplay. Tell us your high score below!

Dev High Score:222
